Summary: RIDING DIRT BIKES 2 OBJECTS CAUGHT OUR ATTENTION IN A CLEARING ABOUT 100 YARDS IN FRONT OF US NEXT DAY I RETURN TO THAT AREA AND SEEN A CRAFT BACK IN THE WOODS.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Marinette
There were no other sightings in Marinette on or around July 14th 1977
divs: Sighting DetailsON A SUMMER DAY ME AND A FRIEND WENT DIRT BIKE RIDING WE GOT ON A TRAIL I WAS LEADING. IN A CLEARING I SAW A WHITE OBJECT,ABOUT FIVE FEET TALL AND 3 FEET WIDE GENTLY BOUCING UP AND DOWN, BUT WAS ABOUT 1 FOOT ABOVE THE GROUND. I STOP AND LOOKED BACK AT MY FRIEND AND SHE STOPPED THE SAME TIME AS I STARING AT THE OBJECTS THEN REALIZING THERE WERE 2 OF THEM. WE WATCHED THEM STAYING IN THE SAME POSITION BOUCING UP AND DOWN THEN THEY MOVED SIDEWAYS INTO THE WOODS' WE DECIDED TO RIDE DOWN AND INVESTIGATE AND COULD NOT FIND ANYTHING. THE NEXT DAY I RETURN ALONE AND RODE DOWN THE SAME TRAIL BUT ABOUT A QUARTER OF A MILE FROM THE ORIDGINAL SIGHTING WE SAW THE DAY BEFORE THERE WAS A SHIP. IT WAS ABOUT 20FEET FROM THE TRAIL IN THE WOODS. IT WAS CAMOFLAGED, 10 FEET IN RADIUS AND I STILTS ABOUT 6 FEET TALL. THIS I DID NOT INVESTIGATE I WAS ALONE BUT I RODE THROUGH THE TRAIL AND SEEM TO REMEMBER THAT IT TOOK ALOT LONGER THEN NORMAL. TO THIS DAY I DONT UNDERSTAND WHY I DIDNT GO BACK TO THE RODE BECAUSE IT WAS A SHORTER DISTANCE I KNOW I WAS VERY FRIGHTENED. THE NEXT DAY MY FATHER CAME WITH BE TO THE AREA OF THE PLACE I SAW THE SHIP. HE SAID THAY WAS SOMETHING THERE CAUSE ALL THE BRUSH WAS PACKED DOWN.
